ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json ns SOAP_ENV http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/ ns ns2 http://mm.io/meetup/product-ws --- payload.SOAP_ENV#Envelope.SOAP_ENV#Body.ns2#getProductListResponse.*ns2#product map { productId : $.productId, sku : $.sku, productName: $.productName, description: $.description, vendorId: $.vendorId, // categoryId: $.categoryId, unitPrice:$.salePrice, qtyInStock:$.qtyInOrder, qtyInOrder:$.qtyInOrder, active:$.active }
